timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to use SubqueryContext instead of OracleStatementParser.SubqueryContext
timeline.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText: Do you think SQL92DMLVisitor need this function as well?
timeline.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText:
ColumnNameContext cname :ctx.columnNames().columnName()
cname ---> each
A blank space is needed in front of ctx.columnNames().columnName()
